title: Ashley Banjo: 'I looked at George Floyd and I saw my dad'
content: This video can not be playedDiversity's Ashley Banjo has spoken out about the death of George Floyd, saying the arrest footage made him feel "sick to my stomach".Speaking to BBC Two's Victoria Derbyshire programme, he reflected on his personal experiences of growing up in a mixed race family in the UK."It brought up... times of being pulled over, being wrongly detained, being questioned," he said.
